Class GuestMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • Menu
      • GuestMenu

  • public class GuestMenu
extends Menu
    GuestMenu is a sub class of Menu class, which handles all the Guests registered in the hotel.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Li Jin Quan, Lee Jian Hao, Chen Xing Yu, Kok Jia Hui

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GuestMenu() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void createNewGuest(java.util.ArrayList<Guest> guestList)
      This method creates a new Guest into the system.
      static void guestMenu(java.util.ArrayList<Guest> guestList, java.util.ArrayList<Room> roomList, java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> reservationList)
      This method directs the user to the Guest Menu based on user input.
      static void printGuestMenu()
      This method prints the Guest Menu to inform the users of the options.
      static void searchGuest(java.util.ArrayList<Guest> guestList)
      This method allows user to search for a Guest details.
      static void updateGuest(java.util.ArrayList<Guest> guestList, java.util.ArrayList<Room> roomList, java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> reservationList)
      This method updates an existing Guest details which is inside guestList Updating Guest will also update roomList and reservationList accordingly

    • Method Detail

      • guestMenu

        public static void guestMenu(java.util.ArrayList<Guest> guestList,
                             java.util.ArrayList<Room> roomList,
                             java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> reservationList)
                      throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This method directs the user to the Guest Menu based on user input.
        Parameters:
        guestList - This list contains the details of all the guest registered in the system.
        roomList - This list contains the details of all the room in the system.
        reservationList - This list contains all the reservations details.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • printGuestMenu

        public static void printGuestMenu()
        This method prints the Guest Menu to inform the users of the options.

      • createNewGuest

        public static void createNewGuest(java.util.ArrayList<Guest> guestList)
        This method creates a new Guest into the system.
        Parameters:
        guestList - This list contains the details of all the guest registered in the system.

      • updateGuest

        public static void updateGuest(java.util.ArrayList<Guest> guestList,
                               java.util.ArrayList<Room> roomList,
                               java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> reservationList)
        This method updates an existing Guest details which is inside guestList Updating Guest will also update roomList and reservationList accordingly
        Parameters:
        guestList - This list contains the details of all the guest registered in the system.
        roomList - This list contains the details of all the room in the system.
        reservationList - This list contains all the reservations details.

      • searchGuest

        public static void searchGuest(java.util.ArrayList<Guest> guestList)
        This method allows user to search for a Guest details.
        Parameters:
        guestList - This list contains the details of all the guest registered in the system.
